references.reason: This paper introduces denoising diffusion probabilistic models (DDPMs), a foundational model for many of the techniques explored in the current paper.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces Stable Diffusion, a key model used for feature extraction in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Label-efficient semantic segmentation with diffusion models
references.reason: This paper is among the first to explore using diffusion models for discriminative tasks, which is a central theme in the current paper.

references.paper_title: Diffusion hyperfeatures: Searching through time and space for semantic correspondence
references.reason: This paper explores using different features from diffusion models, which is relevant to the current paper's investigation into enhancing diffusion features.

references.paper_title: Spair-71k: A large-scale benchmark for semantic correspondence
references.reason: This paper introduces the SPair-71k dataset, one of the key datasets used for evaluating the proposed method in the current paper.
